summary: A documentary on the life of Kurt Cobain and his relationship with Courtney Love.
cast: Nick Broomfield|Kurt Cobain|Courtney Love|Mari Earle|Tracey Marander|Alice Wheeler|Hank Harrison|Rozz Rezabek|Amy Squier|Tom Grant|Dylan Carlson|Al Bowman|Jack Briggs|El Duce|Chelsea Rae|Victoria Mary Clarke|Pat Smear|Larry Flynt|Danny Goldberg|Sam Rubin|Vincent Schiavelli
title: Kurt & Courtney
